name: Candy Cane Lip Balm (Limited Edition)
description:
Candy Canesâ€¦..more than just candy.  They bring special memories to children and adults.  There is something magical about them.

Choose our Candy Cane Lip Balm and make a new memory this season.  

Enriched with Kokum Butter(has the ability to soften dry cracked lips and reduce fine lines). 

Made of natural and organic ingredients of Sweet Almond Oil, Beeswax, Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, Kokum Butter, Peppermint Essential Oil, Avocado Fruit Oil, Meadowfoam Seed Oil, Menthol Crystals, Vitamin E and Organic Rosemary Antioxidant. 

Hand-made, without chemicals and chemical preservatives, without petrolatum, and ~ most importantly ~ without product ingredients you can't pronounce. 

Size:  .15 oz.

name: Sweet Apple Pie Lip Scrub
description:
SCRUB IT, LICK IT AND LOVE IT!  Highly addictive, exfoliating sugar lip scrub.  Not too harsh and gentle enough to use a few times a week.   

Made of edible, natural and organic ingredients of Sugar, Beeswax, Sweet Almond Oil, Coconut Oil, Shea Butter, Raspberry Seed Oil, Organic Apple & Cardomom Flavor, Vitamin E and Organic Rosemary Antioxidant.

Hand-made, without chemicals and chemical preservatives, without petrolatum, and ~ most importantly ~ without product ingredients you can't pronounce. 

Size:  .15 oz.

IF IRRITATION OCCURS, DISCONTINUE USE.

name: Plain Jane Lip Balm
